name: Ninja Endless Runner
description: Introducing a new endless runner called Attack of the Jelly from Nathaniel Maasch. Coming unexpectedly from the kitchen, Jelly, an enemy immune to all forms of attack, will be world’s greatest foe that would convert everything to jelly. However, all hope is not lost since the last member of a forgotten clan has the solution to this great disaster. He must travel many lands while evading a countless onslaught of enemies. With cartoon visuals and motivating music, this game will challenge the endurance of this hero.
